item.title: Miscellaenous
item.description: I love taking film photos, drinking and making coffee, and bouldering. I also recently started making potteries! Please enjoy some of my film photos :) Big Sur, California Kerry Park, Seattle Seattle, Washington Fremont, Seattle Los Angeles, California Vieques, Puerto Rico Pasadena, California I made these mini snowmen ;) Friend's wedding

item.title: Research
item.description: Preprints Prediction Sets for High-Dimensional Mixture of Experts Models. A. Javanmard, S. Shao, and J. Bien. arXiv:2210.16710 Publications Controlling the False Split Rate in Tree-Based Aggregation. S. Shao, J. Bien and A. Javanmard. Accepted to Journal of the American Statistical Association (JASA). arXiv:2108.05350 Multi-Product Dynamic Pricing in High-Dimensions with Heterogeneous Price Sensitivity. A. Javanmard, H. Nazerzadeh and S. Shao. IEEE International Symposium on Information Theory (ISIT), 2020. arXiv:1901.01030
